inputs.name: Args
inputs.description: A string. Additional parameters to the command.

inputs.name: Dimension
inputs.description: 't' or 'x' or 'y' or 'z' or 'a'. Dimension along which to merge, optionally set tr input when dimension is t.

inputs.name: Environ
inputs.description: A dictionary with keys which are a value of type 'str' and with values which are a value of type 'str'. Environment variables.

inputs.name: Ignore exception
inputs.description: A boolean. Print an error message instead of throwing an exception in case the interface fails to run.

inputs.name: In files
inputs.description: A list of items which are an existing file name. No description provided.

inputs.name: Merged file
inputs.description: A file name. No description provided.

inputs.name: Output type
inputs.description: 'nifti_pair' or 'nifti_pair_gz' or 'nifti_gz' or 'nifti'. Fsl output type.

inputs.name: Terminal output
inputs.description: 'stream' or 'allatonce' or 'file' or 'none'. Control terminal output: `stream` - displays to terminal immediately (default), `allatonce` - waits till command is finished to display output, `file` - writes output to file, `none` - output is ignored.

inputs.name: Tr
inputs.description: A float. Use to specify tr in seconds (default is 1.00 sec), overrides dimension and sets it to tr.

name: Merge
description: Merge, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.fsl, interface: Merge).
